_header: That time that Saint John Baptist
Note: For the homily itself, including this story, see 3716.
_description: Story of the Baptism of Christ, from the Northern Homily Cycle (Homily for Trinity Sunday)

BLHar2391.First Lines: Þat tym þat saynt Iohn baptisteIn flome Iordan baptist crist…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …þat heuen cum may weTo wone with gode In trinite
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Die sancte triniti (left margin, f. 195) with “A tale” written above

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Þat tyme þat saynt Ion baptysteIn flum Iordan baptiste
                    cryste…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…In heuen þe graythe wytnes sall beof a gode and persons
                    thre

HunHM129.First Lines:
Þat tyme þat seint Ion þe baptisteIn flum Iordane
                    baptyȝyd criste…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…In heuyn whare grayth wyttynge schall beOff o god and
                    personnis thre
HunHM129.Note:
Listed in Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.
